title: Enhancing Science Instructional Design Competencies Using Conceptual Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizes theory-practice integration competencies when designing science education for corporate managers/leaders

learning_goals: Learners can analyze various conceptual tools (learning theories, design theories) and apply them to science education design
Learners can seek a balance between theory and intuition when designing micro-content in mobile environments
Through case-based discussions, learners can diagnose practical limitations of conceptual tools and propose improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
